metadata.name: Query
metadata.description:
Query

Represents the search criteria against a Datastore.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  where("completed", "=", true)

entities = dataset.run query

metadata.name: kind
metadata.description: Add the kind of entities to query.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind "Task"

all_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: where
metadata.description: Add a property filter to the query.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  where("completed", "=", true)

completed_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: ancestor
metadata.description: Add a filter for entities that inherit from a key.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  ancestor(parent.key)

completed_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: order
metadata.description: Sort the results by a property name. By default, an ascending sort order will be used. To sort in descending order, provide a second argument of a string or symbol that starts with “d”.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  order("due", :desc)

sorted_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: limit
metadata.description: Set a limit on the number of results to be returned.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  limit(10)

paginated_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: offset
metadata.description: Set an offset for the results to be returned.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  limit(10).
  offset(20)

paginated_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: start
metadata.description: Set the cursor to start the results at.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  limit(10).
  cursor(task_cursor)

paginated_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: select
metadata.description: Retrieve only select properties from the matched entities.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  select("completed", "due")

partial_tasks = dataset.run query

metadata.name: group_by
metadata.description: Group results by a list of properties.

examples.code:
query = Gcloud::Datastore::Query.new
query.kind("Task").
  group_by("completed")

grouped_tasks = dataset.run query
